title: Geo3d WGS84 parameters not quite right
description: The PlanetModel parameters for WGS84 are correct only to within 7 significant digits.  In particular, the polar radius is not quite the WGS84 value.

comments.author: Karl Wright
comments.content: Nicholas Knize, did you have a chance to evaluate geo3d with WGS84 support?

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Looks like this patch was already applied at some point.
